topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537abee663687254140b0700#post_537abee663687254140b0700
On the plus side you'll have cybernetics to abuse to your whim when it finely reaches the point where it's cheap.  We already have prosthetics that can outperform natural limbs; they're just really really expensive.  Personally I give it a little under a decade until we got sci fi like cybernetics cause we do have the technology for fake skin that a person can feel; it's just in the experimental alpha stage.

The DOD is actually looking into developing for this for veterans and so forth actually; restoring mobility to disabled veterans.  If I'm not mistaken the FDC just authorized the first human testing of linking prosthetics to your nervous system.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537ac3986368725f636c0700#post_537ac3986368725f636c0700
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]Guys, I can't possibly explain to you how much I hate The Uchiha.[/bq]
Like a decade before Ponies. Naruto fanboys and fangirls were the "Bronies" and "Pegasisters" of the anime world. All ninja-fying everything, and being ninja wannabes. However, they were genuinely annoying to simply obnoxious, especially in MMO communities.

"You never see this happen to Rainbow Dash cosplayers.":http://tilttu.tumblr.com/post/86224616994/zeppelly-but-why-is-it-always-the-sasuke Do you?
